Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near  California/37th
ShortDescription: Northbound #94 California buses are temp rerouted via California, Pershing, Archer, Western, 35th and California due to, street blockage near California/37th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Pershing, Archer, Western, 35th and California due to, street blockage near California/37th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Wilson. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Wilson.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
